results.title: Autotaxin Inhibitor Protects from Chronic Allograft Injury in Rat Kidney Allotransplantation.
results.text_hl: Chronic treatment with ATXi or @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ limited progressive @DISEASE_Proteinuria @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ and ameliorated @<m>DISEASE_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@tubulointerstitial fibrosis@@@ compared with allograft @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@, although the effects were more robust under ATX inhibition.

results.title: Renoprotective effects of empagliflozin in type 1 and type 2 models of diabetic nephropathy superimposed with hypertension.
results.text_hl: Administration of @CHEMICAL_empagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C570240 @@@empagliflozin@@@ alone or in combination with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ reduced @CHEMICAL_Blood_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001786 @@@blood glucose@@@, @DISEASE_Proteinuria @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@, @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@glomerular injury@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@renal fibrosis@@@ in @CHEMICAL_Streptozocin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013311 @@@STZ@@@-SS @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ without altering renal blood flow (RBF) or glomerular filtration rate (GFR).

citations.NLM: Williams JM, Murphy SR, Wu W, Border JJ, Fan F, Roman RJ. Renoprotective effects of empagliflozin in type 1 and type 2 models of diabetic nephropathy superimposed with hypertension. Geroscience. 2022 Dec;44(6):2845-2861. PMID: 35767209

results.title: Clitoria ternatea L. extract prevents kidney damage by suppressing the Ang II/Nox4/oxidative stress cascade in l-NAME-induced hypertension model of rats.
results.text_hl: Glomerular extracellular matrix accumulation, @<m>DISEASE_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@renal fibrosis@@@, and increased serum @CHEMICAL_Creatinine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003404 @@@creatinine@@@ levels were observed in @CHEMICAL_NG_Nitroarginine_Methyl_Ester @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019331 @@@l-NAME@@@-induced @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ and attenuated by CT flower extract or @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ co-treatment (p < 0.05).

results.title: Medications in type-2 diabetics and their association with liver fibrosis
results.text_hl: Medications associated with decreased risk of @<m>DISEASE_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@AF@@@ included @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, liraglutide, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Hydrochlorothiazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006852 @@@hydrochlorothiazide@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ while the use of @CHEMICAL_Furosemide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005665 @@@furosemide@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Spironolactone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013148 @@@spironolactone@@@ were associated with higher prevalence of @<m>DISEASE_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@AF@@@.

citations.NLM: Siddiqui MT, Amin H, Garg R, Chadalavada P, Al-Yaman W, Lopez R, Singh A. Medications in type-2 diabetics and their association with liver fibrosis World J Gastroenterol. 2020 Jun 21;26(23):3249-3259. PMID: 32684739
